Articles.Content:
I've been following DayZ development for a while and recently been watching videos on it. Personally I played the mod for Arma II for a while and I gotta say the standalone looks amazing. I think they have implemented great survival mechanics into. Still needs polishing of course and further development because after all it is in Alpha.

I was curious though, what is everyones thoughts on it? I would love to buy it but don't have the cash sadly...

I think it looks like a really cool game. I have been wanting to get it... but I know that my computer would be unable to handle the game.

Perhaps if I build a new computer over the summer.
I would get it but I don't have much internet I usually just get small indie games that won't use up all my internet while downloading it
